internships.title: Google Summer of Code
internships.description: Google Summer of Code (GSoC) is an annual program that provides university students with an opportunity to work on open source projects with mentorship from experienced developers.
internships.duration: GSoC Contributors work with an open source organization on a 12+ week programming project under the guidance of mentors
internships.stipend: Stipends are paid in two parts, one after each successful evaluation. The dates below are based on the standard 12 week project. If your project is longer, your evaluation and payments schedule will be different. The first evaluation will occur at the halfway point of your project (e.g. For a 16 week project the evaluation will occur after week 8). You can also check your GSoC dashboard to view when your evaluations occur.

internships.title: Software Engineering Intern, 2023
internships.description: Google offers paid full-time internships for students interested in technology, working on core software projects mentored by a Google Engineer. Google hires skilled engineers to tackle global technological challenges, from Google Ads to YouTube.
internships.duration: 10 to 17-week paid, full-time internship for students

internships.title: Security Engineering Intern, Summer 2023
internships.description: Google's Systems Infrastructure team is responsible for building and maintaining the technology that powers Google's services and ensures user privacy and security. As a Security Engineer Intern, you would work on protecting network boundaries, monitoring systems for attacks, and developing tools to support project teams. Google values engineers with a wide range of technical skills who are passionate about addressing technology's biggest challenges and making a positive impact on the world.
internships.location: Remote or In-office: Sydney NSW, Australia

internships.title: Security Consultant Intern, Summer 2023
internships.description: Google offers paid full-time internships for students interested in technology, working on core software projects mentored by a Google Engineer. Google hires skilled engineers to tackle global technological challenges, from Google Ads to YouTube.
internships.location: In-office: New York, NY, USA Reston, VA, USA San Francisco, CA, USA

internships.title: Computer Science & Data Science Internship (2023)
internships.description: As the tech firm that created the mobile world, and with more than 54,000 patents to our name, we’ve made it our business to make a mark. When joining our team at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you're welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team. Come, and be where it begins.

internships.title: JavaScript Development
internships.description: As an elected intern, your main responsibility will be to write efficient and well-documented code in JavaScript and frameworks. You will collaborate with other developers to implement software solutions, contribute to the design and architecture of software, and work on incorporating machine learning components into the project. Regular participation in team meetings to discuss projects and updates is expected.

internships.title: Microsoft Power BI
internships.description: The selected intern will create and maintain Power BI reports and dashboards, design effective data visualizations, analyze complex data sets, and stay up-to-date with advancements in data analysis and visualization. Proficiency in SQL, Excel, and data analysis tools is required.

internships.title: PHP Development
internships.description: The internship involves web development and coding, technical documentation, and technical presentations. Applicants must have strong knowledge of CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML, Ajax, HTML5, PHP, CodeIgniter, Laravel, MySQL, Angular, JSON, WordPress, Magento, and Mern stack. A one-month stipend will be held as security and paid after the internship.

internships.title: Gaming Animator
internships.description: This job involves animating character models and creating animations for characters and animals in gaming. Prior experience in animation for gaming is required.
